caption=Ferdibrand Took from ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''

column1: Ferdibrand was the son of [[Ferdinand Took]]. He was present at [[Bilbo Baggins]]' [[Bilbo's Farewell Party
The name is composed of ''ferdi'' "peace" and ''brand'' "sword"<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
